title: People think a "weak earlygame" is not being able to kill your lane opponent
body:
Lmao try playing a champion with an **ACTUAL** weak early game. One where getting a kill on your lane opponent is a laughable joke. One where you're desperately struggling to not die to get a few CS. 

Try playing {{champion:62}} into a {{champion:122}} {{champion:58}} just once

Try **attempting** to lane as {{champion:84}} or {{champion:75}} against this monstrosity {{champion:80}} ***just once***

Being forced to farm with 550 range autos and 800+ range abilities is NOT a "weak early game". Try playing a champion where you can't even farm under your tower without risk of dying. Oh the wave isn't at your tower? Have fun getting ***ZERO*** farm.

You have absolutely no idea what a weak early game even is anymore

Wukong can kill ppl at lvl 2 and snowball that way.

His E has a ridiculously low CD at base even at rank 1 so you can spam that shit and trade.

it really depends on how much sustain they have vs you 

it's very likely that you OOM trying to combo them repeatedly before you actually manage the kill, it's usually ignite cheese that lets him pull it off vs other shitty early game champs
can win to riven, tryndamere, and talon with his all in if done right.

Tryndamere absolutely annihilates Wukong. This is by far my most feared matchup. He will sustain through your harass and at level 6 its a completely one sided shitshow. By midgame you cant go anywhere near him. He will turret dive and kill you. 

The only time you can beat Riven is if she wastes all her CDs which probably means its a garbage Riven to begin with.

Old Talon was easy but new Talons level 2 damage is completely nuts. He will harass you out of lane no problem
Doesn't lose too hard to fiora or darius
Fiora is a skill matchup to be fair but Darius absolutely destroys Wu. Its not even close.

Tbh Fiora makes everything a skill match up.
That's not a problem with Wukong, that's a problem with Fiora.
How is making matchups based on skill and outplaying a problem? That's a design miracle
Their point was that Wukong being weak made a Vs Fiora lane a skill match up, implying that's normally not the case.
Ok, I just see a lot that fiora making everything a skill matchup is a bad thing, when ideally everything should be that way to an extent.

Wukong doesn't have a good level 2 all in. Theres a few matchups where he can bully but besides those very limited matchups hes all about the level 6 all-in

At level 2, his rank 1 Q has a base damage of 30 and only has a 10% armor shred which is nothing. It also only has a 0.1 AD ratio. His rank 1 E has a base damage of 60 and it has a 0.8 ***bonus*** AD ratio. Bonus AD ratios do jack shit without items.

How do you think a level 2 combo with 90 base damage and absolutely god awful ratios is strong? Not to mention his passive is complete trash in a 1v1. Legit 4 Armor and MR at this point. FOUR.

Don't forget you'll also be tanking all the creeps at level 2 as well.

Spamming abilities with Wukong is the fastest way to make yourself have to hug a tower hoping for an opportunity to recall. The only one that is even remotely okay to spam at early levels is his Q since it doesn't go up in cost, and even then you will be running out of {{item:2033}} charges before you know it.
